noun.definition: The person who leads or commands a group, organization, or country.
noun.example: He is the leader of the opposition party.
She is a leader in her field.

verb.definition: Show the way to (an individual or a group) by going with or ahead.
verb.example: The guide led us through the forest.

verb.definition: Be in charge or command of.
verb.example: He led the country during the war.

usage_examples: A good leader inspires confidence in others.
She was elected as the team leader.
